title: PESSAT Fees
content:
The Pessat fees has been shown as 4,80,000 per annum for those joining this year. Will it be the same for the duration of 4 years or will it increase?

Also, after counselling, we were given a fee receipt stating 4,21,000 as tution fees and 59,000 was other things. So, the 40% and 50% scholarships will be given on 4,21,000 or 4,80,000 (Hoping it is 4,80,000).

comments.body: It will be the same for all 4 years. And scholarship will be given on 4,80,000.
